COMMIT.MESSAGE: sqlite_state: Fix RewriteVolumeConfig The VolumeConfig table does not have an ID column, thus use the Name column to update it. Fixes #23052 Signed-off-by: Marius Hoch <mail@mariushoch.de>

[v4.9-rhel] sqlite_state: Fix RewriteVolumeConfig The VolumeConfig table does not have an ID column, thus use the Name column to update it. Fixes #23052 This fixes an error when `podman system renumber` would fail if a volume existed. Addresses: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/RHEL-50230 https://issues.redhat.com/browse/RHEL-50231 Signed-off-by: Marius Hoch <mail@mariushoch.de> Signed-off-by: tomsweeneyredhat <tsweeney@redhat.com>
